title: President Donald J. Trump is Promoting America’s Ocean Economy – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Energy & Environment	

Issued on:
June 19, 2018
From sea to shining sea, Americans benefit from the ocean’s bounty — from the industries it supports and the jobs it creates.
						President Donald J. Trump					STREAMLINING FEDERAL OCEAN POLICY: President Donald J. Trump is establishing a more streamlined process for Federal coordination on ocean policy. EMPOWERING STATES: President Trump is empowering States by eliminating duplicative Federal bureaucracy.PROMOTING A STRONG OCEAN ECONOMY: President Trump is reducing unnecessary bureaucracy and regulatory uncertainty which serve as headwinds for America’s ocean industries.
